title: Premier League star 'cheating on long-term girlfriend and filming bedroom antics'
text:

A married Premier League has allegedly been cheating on his wife - and filming his bedroom antics.

The allegation comes from The Secret Wag, who has lifted the lid on the off-field behaviour of players in a column with the Sun.

While the identity of the player has not been confirmed, the pseudonym has claimed the top-flight star has been up to no good.

The Secret Wag states players love "sorting out affairs" on their mobile phones and also 'film their antics' in the bedroom.

"One Premier League star has been up to this. His long-term girlfriend would be ­horrified – but I know she is cheating on him, too! They are as bad as each other," the column writes.

"They like to think they are the ­Kardashians but both s*** around behind each other’s back. Players have always loved a bit of camera work."

(Image: PA Archive/PA Images)

The column also goes on to discuss the lengths players will go to to stop their affairs getting out in the public.

It alleges that senior players get younger teammates to take care of their 'playing away' phone, pretending to be them.

"There are stars in the Premier League who I know currently have two phones. One of these players and his other half have recently had a baby," the pseudonym continues.

"It stinks. He’s not just got one extra woman, though. Apparently he has loads."

(Image: CameraSport via Getty Images)

On the field, Manchester City are bidding to close the gap on Liverpool on Sunday when they take on Wolves .

Liverpool went eight points clear of City with a dramatic victory over Leicester at Anfield on Sunday.

The Foxes looked to have secured a point but Liverpool scored a last-gasp penalty to continue their fine start to the season.
description: The allegation comes from The Sun's Secret Wag, who has lifted the lid on the off-field behaviour of players
